docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Oct. 19 (AP) -- The trouble-plagued world basketball tournament, scheduled to begin Saturday with teams from twelve nations participating, will be played in the new Marcana gymnasium if the 35,000-seat arena is completed.
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Oct. 19 (AP) -- The trouble-plagued world basketball tournament, scheduled to begin Saturday with teams from twelve nations participating, will be played in the new Marcana gymnasium if the 35,000-seat arena is completed.

headline.main: Brazil Speeds New Gym For Basketball Opener
